Job.Name: Expert Content/Copywriter
Job.Description:
We are looking for a content copywriter who can write social media and blog posts for both internal and external use.
The average client needs 15-20 social media posts a month, and it will scale up to 40, 60, 80 as clients are added. The target market is law firms and schools - daycares, Montessori, etc.
Will start at about 10 hours a week and scale up from there depending on how long it takes to get work completed.

Job.Name: Dato CMS Support
Job.Description:
At a high level, we have 2 sites that are currently hosted in DATO, you’ve done some work for us on the boltinc.com side, but our other website which is access.boltinsurance.com needs some support.
We have a marketing agency who does our web development but they’re not familiar with DATO, so it’s been a struggle trying to get them up to speed quickly. Small issues like the site not deploying or trying to create a simple landing page is what we’re working on right now.
